trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were 2 other sightings in Denver on or around October 19th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 10:15 pm, just after my band had finished practicing, my guitarist, my keyboardist, my cousin and myself were standing outside having a conversation when my guitarist pointed up into the sky as the biggest meteor Ive ever seen streaked across the sky from NE to SW for about 3-4 seconds. The meteor was so close and bright that bits of debris and flames were visible. Thinking nothing of it we continued our conversation when approximately 1 minute after the meteor I looked up and saw a triangle of lights directly over us flying silently in the exact same path, from NE to SW, as the meteor. The object was moving quickly but from the moment we saw it till it finally disappeared into the horizon took about 15-20 seconds. The meteor may be a coincidence, but I figured I might as well include it.
